howItWorks.title: How does it work in practice?
howItWorks.subtitle: Turning waste into data and data into savings is simple with Ctrl+Waste. See how your operation works in 5 steps:

steps.title: Install and customize
steps.text: Activate Ctrl+Waste on your tablet, mobile, or desktop. Customize the waste categories and areas of your operation. Register your collection providers.

steps.title: Record the weights
steps.text: In daily routines, employees weigh the waste on dedicated scales and enter the data into the system in real time with up to 3 clicks.

steps.title: Visualize the data
steps.text: Dashboards show waste composition, generation by area, landfill diversion rate, and final destination.

steps.title: Generate reports and mandatory documents for waste transportation
steps.text: Generate technical reports with one click and let the system automate the creation of the mandatory documents for waste transportation.

steps.title: Make strategic decisions
steps.text: Use platform insights to reduce waste, review processes, plan actions, and save resources.

aboutHero.title: About us
aboutHero.subtitle: Technology to turn waste into data and data into savings.
aboutHero.paragraph1: Ctrl+Waste is a cleantech solution designed to make waste management more efficient, cost-effective, and strategic. We combine intelligent software and affordable hardware to provide the control your operation needs: by weight, waste type, generating area, and time period.
aboutHero.paragraph2: With Ctrl+Waste, your company gains full visibility over what it discards, identifies opportunities to reduce waste, and automates essential processes, such as issuing the Waste Transport Manifest (MTR).
aboutHero.paragraph3: More than just monitoring, we help you make decisions based on real data ‚Äî a key step toward achieving ESG goals, certifications, and operational gains.

valuesSection.title: Our values
valuesSection.description: We believe technology should serve a greater purpose. Our values guide every line of code, every feature, and every interaction we have with our customers and our future.
valuesSection.subtitle: Our Principles

values.text: Scalability that grows with your business

pedro.bio: Pedro is a bioprocess engineer (UFRJ), with a master's degree in Sustainability Science (PUC-Rio), and a specialist in Sustainability Design. Founder of the consultancy HUBIS, he has been recognized for leading award-winning projects with environmental and social impact. At Ctrl+Waste, he combines strategic vision, innovation, and purpose to transform the waste sector with scalable and sustainable solutions.

gustavo.bio: Gustavo is a technology specialist with experience in digital project development and management. With international experience in Ireland and experience in various sectors, he brings a user-centric and efficiency-focused approach. At Ctrl+Waste, he is responsible for technological solutions that drive environmental impact with accessible innovation.

julia.bio: With a degree in Advertising and specializations in Branding (University of Amsterdam) and Business Management (ESS ‚Äì Prague), Julia integrates creativity, strategy, and sustainability. Her career includes award-winning projects that connect marketing and ESG. At Ctrl+Waste, she leads brand building and commercial strategy, promoting ethical growth and positive impact.
